document.full_text: mel kiper didn't play or coach in the nfl.  but he created the role of the nfl tv draft guru and has played it for decades on espn.
document.title: is mayock or kiper the true king of the nfl draft?
lines_and_colors: mel kiper didn't play or coach in the nfl.  but he created the role of the nfl tv draft guru and has played it for decades on espn.
